title: CSU Channel Islands R Tools
text: goal csucistats provide helper functions used California State University Channel Islands.

title: CSU Channel Islands R Tools
text: can install development version csucistats GitHub : may also install package used quarto webr:
code: install.packages('csucistats',                   repos = c('https://inqs909.r-universe.dev',                             'https://cloud.r-project.org')) webr::install('csucistats',               repos = c('https://inqs909.r-universe.dev',                          'https://repo.r-wasm.org'))

what: Generate a QMD file to create a homework template for class. Files will be saved in it's own folder. — new_hw
title: Generate a QMD file to create a homework template for class. Files will be saved in it's own folder. — new_hw
text: Generate QMD file create homework template class. Files saved folder.

title: Generate a QMD file to create a homework template for class. Files will be saved in it's own folder. — new_hw
code: new_hw(   hw_name,   name = "Name Here",   title = "Title Here",   date = "`r format(Sys.time(),'%m-%d-%Y')`",   dir_loc = getwd(),   data = FALSE )

title: Generate a QMD file to create a homework template for class. Files will be saved in it's own folder. — new_hw
text: hw_name Name folder store important files homework assignment. argument remove unwanted punctuations spaces. name name. title Optional title give assignment. date Optional Date give document. dir_loc Optional location place folder hw template contents. data TRUE, data folder constructed hw template folder.
